text: Excited to share that Troutman Pepper partners Callan G. Stein, Michael S. Lowe, and associate Christopher M. Brolley will delve into '101 - Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) in College Athletics' at the Higher Education & Healthcare Research Compliance Conference 2024 in New Orleans! Join us on Tuesday, June 11, at 9:45 a.m. CT to learn about current rules and future developments.
